SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Circle
Represents a drawable circle, centered at a specified midpoint.
Drawable
Abstract base class for drawable objects, encapsulating essential properties such as color, position, border, and orientation.
Image
Represents a drawable image that can be positioned, resized, and rotated.
Input
The `Input` class provides utility methods for reading various data types (e.g., strings, characters, integers, floating-point numbers, boolean values) from the console.
Line
Represents a drawable line from a starting point to an endpoint.
Polygon
Represents a drawable polygon defined by arrays of x and y coordinates for vertices.
Rectangle
Represents a drawable rectangle with specified width and height.
Text
Represents a drawable text element that can be positioned, sized, colored, and rotated with center alignment.
Triangle
Represents a drawable triangle with a specified base and height.
Window
The Window class provides a graphical window for drawing various shapes.
Window.KeyPressInterface
Interface to handle key press events.
